newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT-Quixote rated strong buy.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT-Quixote rated strong buy.

text.p: --Barrington Research analyst Alexander Paris said he raised his rating on Quixote Corp to strong buy, or 2-Buy, from neutral, or 3-Hold.
--Shares in the compact disc manufacturer were up 1/2 to 7-1/2.
--"It has been a long drought, but we finally had a modestly positive surprise in Quixote's fourth quarter report as the restructuring was finally complete," Paris said.
--Quixote reported fourth-quarter earnings of $0.27 per share, up from $0.16 per share a year earlier.
